UPLOAD_DTSAPI_DESCRIPTION_TITLE.message: There are two ways to upload passages:

UPLOAD_DTSAPI_DESCRIPTION_DETAILS.message:
• Select one reference that you want to upload.
  • Select multiple references to upload as a range from the minimum to the maximum number. For example, if you choose 2, 5 and 8, the range from 2 to 8 references will be uploaded.
